titles.title: Recognizing and honoring Prevent Blindness America for its 100 years of dedication to preventing blindness and preserving eyesight.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
12/6/2007--Introduced.
Recognizes the invaluable contributions and positive impact of Prevent Blindness America and its affiliates. Congratulates and commends such organization for 100 years of preventing blindness and preserving sight.
